advancements.cobblemon.brew_all.descript: Заварите все доступные предметы с помощью целебного отвара
advancements.cobblemon.brew_full_restore: Следуйте по древу зельеварения и сварганьте полное восстановление с помощью люм-ягоды и максимального зелья
advancements.cobblemon.brew_potion: Мои зелья тебе не по зубам
advancements.cobblemon.brew_potion.descr: Сварите оран-ягоду в целебном отваре, чтобы получить зелье
advancements.cobblemon.craft_ancient_bal: Используйте гальки, чтобы сделать все пятнадцать древних покеболов
advancements.cobblemon.craft_apricorn_ba: Сделайте все семь оригинальных абрижёлудевых покеболов
Сделайте все семь покеболов базовых цветов
advancements.cobblemon.craft_poke_ball.d: Сделайте свой первый покебол, используя четыре абрижёлудя одного вида и медный слиток
advancements.cobblemon.craft_remedy.desc: Сделайте лекарство, — лечебный предмет, что пригодится на ранних этапах, и чьё действие впоследствии может быть усилено
advancements.cobblemon.evolve_gholdengo_: Эволюционируйте гиммигула в полностью покрытого незеритом голденго
advancements.cobblemon.evolve_shedinja.d: Получите шединджу, имея лишний покебол в инвентаре
advancements.cobblemon.first_battle_vict: Сразитесь с другим тренером и выйдите победителем
advancements.cobblemon.first_evolution.d: Выполните требования по эволюции покемона и эволюционируйте его из меню команды
advancements.cobblemon.full_party.descri: Поймайте больше покемонов и соберите полную команду из 6
Поместите гальку рядом с лавой или магмой, чтобы вырастить её
advancements.cobblemon.harvest_apricorn_: Иногда из абрижёлудей выпадают семена. Посадите их, чтобы вырастить новое дерево.
advancements.cobblemon.healing_machine.d: Дождитесь окончания зарядки исцеляющей машины, а затем исцелите свою команду
advancements.cobblemon.max_level_baby.de: Возрастите покемона первой формы, способного эволюционировать, до 100 уровня
advancements.cobblemon.medicinal_brew.de: Сварите целебный лук-порей, чтобы создать основу для будущих лекарств
advancements.cobblemon.obtain_all_berrie: Соберите все виды ягод в Cobblemon
Получите все 6 цветов мяты характера и получите доступ ко всем видам характеров
advancements.cobblemon.obtain_berry.desc: Найдите любую ягоду, — дикое растение, растущее на поверхности и имеющее множество применений
advancements.cobblemon.obtain_big_root.d: Найдите большой корень, — дикое растение, растущее в грязных пещерах близко к поверхности
advancements.cobblemon.obtain_fossil.des: Обнаружьте окаменелость, зарытую глубоко в истерзанной временем земле
advancements.cobblemon.obtain_leek.descr: Получите дикий овощ, растущий в пресной воде, — целебный лук-порей
advancements.cobblemon.obtain_mint.descr: Найдите мяту характера, — дикое растение, растущее высоко в горах
advancements.cobblemon.obtain_mutated_be: Посадите ягодные деревья разных типов друг с другом и пронаблюдайте их мутацию
advancements.cobblemon.obtain_revival_he: Найдите воскрес-траву, — дикое растение, растущее в пышных пещерах
advancements.cobblemon.obtain_tumbleston: Безопасно извлеките гальку из подозрительного песка или гравия
Добудьте вивишок, выращенный из его редких семян
advancements.cobblemon.own_zangoose_sevi: Держите в своей команде зангуса и севайпера
advancements.cobblemon.resurrect_pokemon: Получите покемона из окаменелости с помощью машины воскресения
advancements.cobblemon.root.description: Выберите первого покемона и выдвигайтесь в новое путешествие
advancements.cobblemon.use_candy.descrip: Используйте любую конфету опыта на покемоне
advancements.cobblemon.use_pasture.descr: Создайте пастбище и позвольте своим друзьям свободно гулять
advancements.cobblemon.use_revive.descri: Используйте оживление, максимальное оживление или воскрес-траву, чтобы возродить павшего покемона
cobblemon.ability.adaptability.desc: Усиливает атаки того же типа, что и у покемона.
cobblemon.ability.aerilate.desc: Обычные атаки становятся воздушного типа. Мощность этих атак немного возрастает.
cobblemon.ability.aftermath.desc: Наносит урон атакующему, если атака была завершающим ударом.
cobblemon.ability.analytic.desc: Усиливает атаки, если покемон атакует последним.
cobblemon.ability.angerpoint.desc: Покемон гневается при критическом ударе, и его атака становится максимальной.
cobblemon.ability.angershell.desc: Когда у покемона больше 1/2 его максимального запаса здоровья и он получает урон от атаки, от чего его здоровье снижается до 1/2 или меньше, его атака, специальная атака и скорость увеличиваются на 1 ступень, а защита и специальная защита снижаются на 1 ступень. Этот эффект применяется после всех ударов многоударной атаки. Эффект предотвращается, если у атаки была вторичная функция, удалённая способностью Sheer Force.
cobblemon.ability.anticipation.desc: Покемон способен чувствовать опасные атаки противника.
cobblemon.ability.armortail.desc: Приоритетные атаки, используемые противниками и нацеленные на этого покемона или его союзников, не оказывают никакого эффекта.
cobblemon.ability.aromaveil.desc: Защищает себя и союзников от атак, ограничивающих выбор атак.
cobblemon.ability.asoneglastrier.desc: Эта способность сочетает в себе эффекты способностей Unnerve калирекса и Chilling Neigh гластриера.
cobblemon.ability.asonespectrier.desc: Эта способность сочетает в себе эффекты способностей Unnerve калирекса и Grim Neigh спектриера.
cobblemon.ability.aurabreak.desc: Эффекты способностей типа «Аура» становятся обратными, что снижает мощность затронутых атак.
cobblemon.ability.ballfetch.desc: Если покемон не держит предмет, он подберёт покебол после первой неудачной попытки броска в бою.
cobblemon.ability.battlearmor.desc: Твёрдая броня защищает покемона от критических ударов.
cobblemon.ability.battlebond.desc: Победа над противником укрепляет связь покемона с тренером, превращая его в Грениндзю Эша. «Водный сюрикен» становится мощнее.
cobblemon.ability.beadsofruin.desc: Специальная защита всех других активных покемонов уменьшается на 25%.
cobblemon.ability.beastboost.desc: Покемон усиливает свою наиболее развитую характеристику каждый раз, когда побеждает противника.
cobblemon.ability.berserk.desc: Увеличивает специальную атаку покемона, когда его здоровье на половине или стало меньше после удара.
cobblemon.ability.bigpecks.desc: Защищает покемона от эффектов, снижающих защиту.
cobblemon.ability.blaze.desc: Усиливает огненные атаки, когда у покемона низкое здоровье.
cobblemon.ability.bulletproof.desc: Защищает покемона от некоторых атак в виде мячей и бомб.
cobblemon.ability.cheekpouch.desc: Восстанавливает здоровье покемона, когда он ест ягоду.
cobblemon.ability.chillingneigh.desc: Когда покемон побеждает противника, он издаёт леденящее ржание, увеличивая свою атаку.
cobblemon.ability.chlorophyll.desc: Увеличивает скорость покемона при ярком солнечном свете.
cobblemon.ability.clearbody.desc: Предотвращает снижение характеристик покемона атаками или способностями других покемонов.
cobblemon.ability.colorchange.desc: Тип покемона становится таким же, как и тип атаки, используемого против него.
cobblemon.ability.comatose.desc: Он всегда в сонливом состоянии и никогда не просыпается. Может атаковать, не просыпаясь.
cobblemon.ability.commander.desc: Если этот покемон — татсугири и активным союзником является дондозо, татсугири залезает в рот дондозо. У дондозо увеличиваются атака, специальная атака, защита, специальная защита и скорость на 2 ступени. Во время этого эффекта дондозо нельзя заменить, татсугири не может выбирать действия, и атаки, направленные на него, будут избегаться, но он всё равно будет получать непрямой урон. Если татсугири потеряет сознание во время действия эффекта, можно вызвать ему замену, но дондозо не заменится. Если дондозо потеряет сознание во время действия эффекта, татсугири сможет выбирать действия.
cobblemon.ability.competitive.desc: Резко повышает спецатаку, когда понижается любая характеристика.
cobblemon.ability.compoundeyes.desc: Составные глаза покемона повышают его точность.
cobblemon.ability.corrosion.desc: Покемон может отравить цель, даже если она стального или ядовитого типа.
cobblemon.ability.costar.desc: При выходе этот покемон копирует все изменения характеристик своего союзника.
cobblemon.ability.cottondown.desc: Когда покемон получает удар, он разбрасывает хлопок, снижающий скорость всех покемонов, кроме себя.
cobblemon.ability.cudchew.desc: Если этот покемон съест ягоду, он съест её снова в конце следующего хода.
cobblemon.ability.curiousmedicine.desc: Когда покемон вступает в бой, он рассеивает лекарство из своей раковины, что отменяет все изменения характеристик союзников.
cobblemon.ability.cursedbody.desc: Может отключить атаку, используемую против покемона.
cobblemon.ability.cutecharm.desc: Контакт с покемоном может вызвать влюблённость.
cobblemon.ability.damp.desc: Предотвращает использование взрывных атак, таких как «Самоуничтожение», смачивая окрестности.
cobblemon.ability.dancer.desc: Когда другой покемон использует танцевальную атаку, он может использовать танцевальную атаку вслед за этим, независимо от своей скорости.
cobblemon.ability.dauntlessshield.desc: Увеличивает защиту покемона, когда он вступает в бой.
cobblemon.ability.dazzling.desc: Удивляет противников, делая их неспособными атаковать приоритетными атаками.
cobblemon.ability.defeatist.desc: Уменьшает атаку и спецатаку покемона вдвое, когда его здоровье на половине или меньше.
cobblemon.ability.defiant.desc: Сильно увеличивает атаку покемона, когда понижается его характеристика.
cobblemon.ability.deltastream.desc: Покемон изменяет погоду, устраняя все слабости летающего типа.
cobblemon.ability.desolateland.desc: Покемон изменяет погоду, нейтрализуя водные атаки.
cobblemon.ability.disguise.desc: Один раз за бой, покрытие, которое защищает покемона, может защитить его от атаки.
cobblemon.ability.download.desc: Сравнивает защиту и спецзащиту противника перед тем, как увеличить свою атаку или спецатаку — в зависимости от того, что будет эффективнее.
cobblemon.ability.drizzle.desc: Покемон вызывает дождь, когда вступает в бой.
cobblemon.ability.drought.desc: Усиливает солнечный свет, когда покемон вступает в бой.
cobblemon.ability.dryskin.desc: Восстанавливает здоровье во время дождя или при попадании водных атак. Уменьшает здоровье при ярком солнечном свете и увеличивает урон от огненных атак.
cobblemon.ability.earlybird.desc: Покемон просыпается от сна в два раза быстрее, чем другие покемоны.
cobblemon.ability.eartheater.desc: Этот покемон невосприимчив к атакам земляного типа и восстанавливает 1/4 своего максимального запаса здоровья, округленного в меньшую сторону, когда его поражает атака земляного типа.
cobblemon.ability.effectspore.desc: Контакт с покемоном может вызвать отравление, сон или паралич у атакующего.
cobblemon.ability.electricsurge.desc: Превращает землю в электрическое поле, когда покемон вступает в бой.
cobblemon.ability.electromorphosis.desc: Этот покемон получает эффект заряда, когда получает удар от атаки.
cobblemon.ability.embodyaspectcornerston: Сердце покемона наполняется воспоминаниями, заставляя маску угла сиять и увеличивая защиту покемона.
cobblemon.ability.embodyaspecthearthflam: Сердце покемона наполняется воспоминаниями, заставляя маску очага сиять и увеличивая атаку покемона.
cobblemon.ability.embodyaspectteal.desc: Сердце покемона наполняется воспоминаниями, заставляя тёмно-зелёную маску сиять и увеличивая скорость покемона.
cobblemon.ability.embodyaspectwellspring: Сердце покемона наполняется воспоминаниями, заставляя маску источника сиять и увеличивая спецзащиту покемона.
cobblemon.ability.emergencyexit.desc: Покемон, почувствовав опасность, меняется местами, когда его здоровье на половине или меньше.
cobblemon.ability.fairyaura.desc: Усиливает атаки каждого покемона волшебного типа.
cobblemon.ability.flamebody.desc: Контакт с покемоном может поджечь атакующего.
cobblemon.ability.flashfire.desc: Усиливает огненные атаки покемона, если его поражает огненная атака.
cobblemon.ability.flowergift.desc: Увеличивает атаку и спецзащиту себя и союзников при ярком солнечном свете.
cobblemon.ability.flowerveil.desc: Покемоны травяного типа союзников защищены от статусов и снижения их характеристик.
cobblemon.ability.fluffy.desc: Уменьшает урон от атак, вовлекающих прямой контакт, но удваивает урон от атак огненного типа.
cobblemon.ability.forecast.desc: Покемон трансформируется в зависимости от погоды, меняя свой тип на водный, огненный или ледяной.
cobblemon.ability.forewarn.desc: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon can tell one of the moves an opposing Pokémon has.
cobblemon.ability.frisk.desc: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon can check an opposing Pokémon's held item.
cobblemon.ability.fullmetalbody.desc: Prevents other Pokémon's moves or Abilities from lowering the Pokémon's stats.
cobblemon.ability.furcoat.desc: Вдвое снижает урон от физических атак.
cobblemon.ability.galewings.desc: Gives priority to Flying-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is full.
cobblemon.ability.galvanize.desc: Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.
cobblemon.ability.gluttony.desc: Makes the Pokémon eat a held Berry when its HP drops to half or less, which is sooner than usual.
cobblemon.ability.goodasgold.desc: This Pokemon is immune to Status moves.
cobblemon.ability.gooey.desc: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.
cobblemon.ability.gorillatactics.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat but only allows the use of the first selected move.
cobblemon.ability.grasspelt.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Defense stat on Grassy Terrain.
cobblemon.ability.grassysurge.desc: Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
cobblemon.ability.grimneigh.desc: When the Pokémon knocks out a target, it utters a terrifying neigh, which boosts its Sp. Atk stat.
cobblemon.ability.guarddog.desc: This Pokemon is immune to the effect of the Intimidate Ability and raises its Attack by 1 stage instead. This Pokemon cannot be forced to switch out by another Pokemon's attack or item.
cobblemon.ability.gulpmissile.desc: When the Pokémon uses Surf or Dive, it will come back with prey. When it takes damage, it will spit out the prey to attack.
cobblemon.ability.guts.desc: It's so gutsy that having a status condition boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat.
cobblemon.ability.hadronengine.desc: On switch-in, summons Electric Terrain. During Electric Terrain, Sp. Atk is 1.3333x.
cobblemon.ability.harvest.desc: May create another Berry after one is used.
cobblemon.ability.healer.desc: Sometimes heals an ally's status condition.
cobblemon.ability.heatproof.desc: The heatproof body of the Pokémon halves the damage from Fire-type moves that hit it.
cobblemon.ability.honeygather.desc: The Pokémon may gather Honey after a battle.
cobblemon.ability.hospitality.desc: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it showers its ally with hospitality, restoring a small amount of the ally's HP
cobblemon.ability.hungerswitch.desc: The Pokémon changes its form, alternating between its Full Belly Mode and Hangry Mode after the end of each turn.
cobblemon.ability.hustle.desc: Boosts the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.
cobblemon.ability.hydration.desc: Heals status conditions if it's raining.
cobblemon.ability.hypercutter.desc: The Pokémon's proud of its powerful pincers. They prevent other Pokémon from lowering its Attack stat.
cobblemon.ability.icebody.desc: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in a hailstorm.
cobblemon.ability.iceface.desc: The Pokémon's ice head can take a physical attack as a substitute, but the attack also changes the Pokémon's appearance. The ice will be restored when it hails.
cobblemon.ability.icescales.desc: The Pokémon is protected by ice scales, which halve the damage taken from special moves.
cobblemon.ability.illuminate.desc: Raises the likelihood of meeting wild Pokémon by illuminating the surroundings.
cobblemon.ability.illusion.desc: Comes out disguised as the Pokémon in the party's last spot.
cobblemon.ability.immunity.desc: The immune system of the Pokémon prevents it from getting poisoned.
cobblemon.ability.imposter.desc: Покемон перевоплотится в покемона, перед которым стоит.
cobblemon.ability.infiltrator.desc: Passes through the opposing Pokémon's barrier, substitute, and the like and strikes.
cobblemon.ability.innardsout.desc: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit by the amount equal to its last HP.
cobblemon.ability.innerfocus.desc: The Pokémon's intensely focused, and that protects the Pokémon from flinching.
cobblemon.ability.insomnia.desc: The Pokémon is suffering from insomnia and cannot fall asleep.
cobblemon.ability.intimidate.desc: The Pokémon intimidates opposing Pokémon upon entering battle, lowering their Attack stat.
cobblemon.ability.intrepidsword.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat when the Pokémon enters a battle.
cobblemon.ability.ironbarbs.desc: Inflicts damage on the attacker upon contact with iron barbs.
cobblemon.ability.justified.desc: Being hit by a Dark-type move boosts the Attack stat of the Pokémon, for justice.
cobblemon.ability.keeneye.desc: Keen eyes prevent other Pokémon from lowering this Pokémon's accuracy.
cobblemon.ability.klutz.desc: The Pokémon can't use any held items.
cobblemon.ability.leafguard.desc: Prevents status conditions in harsh sunlight.
cobblemon.ability.levitate.desc: By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.
cobblemon.ability.libero.desc: Changes the Pokémon's type to the type of the move it's about to use.
cobblemon.ability.lightningrod.desc: The Pokémon draws in all Electric-type moves. Instead of being hit by Electric-type moves, it boosts its Sp. Atk.
cobblemon.ability.limber.desc: Its limber body protects the Pokémon from paralysis.
cobblemon.ability.lingeringaroma.desc: Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon have their Ability changed to Lingering Aroma. Does not affect Pokemon with the As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Commander, Disguise, Gulp Missile, Hadron Engine, Ice Face, Lingering Aroma, Multitype, Orichalcum Pulse, Power Construct, Protosynthesis, Quark Drive, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Zen Mode, or Zero to Hero Abilities.
cobblemon.ability.liquidooze.desc: The oozed liquid has a strong stench, which damages attackers using any draining move.
cobblemon.ability.liquidvoice.desc: All sound-based moves become Water-type moves.
cobblemon.ability.longreach.desc: The Pokémon uses its moves without making contact with the target.
cobblemon.ability.magicbounce.desc: Reflects status moves instead of getting hit by them.
cobblemon.ability.magicguard.desc: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.
cobblemon.ability.magician.desc: The Pokémon steals the held item of a Pokémon it hits with a move.
cobblemon.ability.magmaarmor.desc: The Pokémon is covered with hot magma, which prevents the Pokémon from becoming frozen.
cobblemon.ability.magnetpull.desc: Prevents Steel-type Pokémon from escaping using its magnetic force.
cobblemon.ability.marvelscale.desc: The Pokémon's marvelous scales boost the Defense stat if it has a status condition.
cobblemon.ability.megalauncher.desc: Powers up aura and pulse moves.
cobblemon.ability.merciless.desc: The Pokémon's attacks become critical hits if the target is poisoned.
cobblemon.ability.mimicry.desc: Changes the Pokémon's type depending on the terrain.
cobblemon.ability.mindseye.desc: The Pokémon ignores changes to opponents' evasiveness, its accuracy can't be lowered, and it can hit Ghost types with Normal-type and Fighting-type moves
cobblemon.ability.minus.desc: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat of the Pokémon if an ally with the Plus or Minus Ability is also in battle.
cobblemon.ability.mirrorarmor.desc: Bounces back only the stat-lowering effects that the Pokémon receives.
cobblemon.ability.mistysurge.desc: Turns the ground into Misty Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
cobblemon.ability.moldbreaker.desc: Moves can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.
cobblemon.ability.moody.desc: Raises one stat sharply and lowers another every turn.
cobblemon.ability.motordrive.desc: Boosts its Speed stat if hit by an Electric-type move instead of taking damage.
cobblemon.ability.moxie.desc: The Pokémon shows moxie, and that boosts the Attack stat after knocking out any Pokémon.
cobblemon.ability.multiscale.desc: Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes while its HP is full.
cobblemon.ability.multitype.desc: Changes the Pokémon's type to match the Plate or Z-Crystal it holds.
cobblemon.ability.mummy.desc: Contact with the Pokémon changes the attacker's Ability to Mummy.
cobblemon.ability.myceliummight.desc: This Pokemon's Status moves ignore certain Abilities of other Pokemon, and go last among Pokemon using the same or greater priority moves.
cobblemon.ability.naturalcure.desc: All status conditions heal when the Pokémon switches out.
cobblemon.ability.neuroforce.desc: Powers up moves that are super effective.
cobblemon.ability.neutralizinggas.desc: If the Pokémon with Neutralizing Gas is in the battle, the effects of all Pokémon's Abilities will be nullified or will not be triggered.
cobblemon.ability.noguard.desc: The Pokémon employs no-guard tactics to ensure incoming and outgoing attacks always land.
cobblemon.ability.normalize.desc: All the Pokémon's moves become Normal type. The power of those moves is boosted a little.
cobblemon.ability.oblivious.desc: The Pokémon is oblivious, and that keeps it from being infatuated or falling for taunts.
cobblemon.ability.opportunist.desc: When an opposing Pokemon has a stat stage raised, this Pokemon copies the effect.
cobblemon.ability.orichalcumpulse.desc: On switch-in, summons Sunny Day. During Sunny Day, Attack is 1.3333x.
cobblemon.ability.overcoat.desc: Защищает покемона от таких вещей, как песок, град и порошки.
cobblemon.ability.overgrow.desc: Все атаки травяного типа получают усиление, когда у покемона остаётся мало здоровья.
cobblemon.ability.owntempo.desc: Этот покемон живёт в своем ритме, что не позволяет сбить его с толку.
cobblemon.ability.pastelveil.desc: Protects the Pokémon and its ally Pokémon from being poisoned.
cobblemon.ability.perishbody.desc: When hit by a move that makes direct contact, the Pokémon and the attacker will faint after three turns unless they switch out of battle.
cobblemon.ability.pickpocket.desc: Steals an item from an attacker that made direct contact.
cobblemon.ability.pickup.desc: The Pokémon may pick up the item an opposing Pokémon used during a battle. It may pick up items outside of battle, too.
cobblemon.ability.pixilate.desc: Normal-type moves become Fairy-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.
cobblemon.ability.plus.desc: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat of the Pokémon if an ally with the Plus or Minus Ability is also in battle.
cobblemon.ability.poisonheal.desc: Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned instead of losing HP.
cobblemon.ability.poisonpoint.desc: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.
cobblemon.ability.poisonpuppeteer.desc: Pokémon poisoned by Pecharunt's moves will also become confused.
cobblemon.ability.poisontouch.desc: May poison a target when the Pokémon makes contact.
cobblemon.ability.powerconstruct.desc: Other Cells gather to aid when its HP becomes half or less. Then the Pokémon changes its form to Complete Forme.
cobblemon.ability.powerofalchemy.desc: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.
cobblemon.ability.powerspot.desc: Just being next to the Pokémon powers up moves.
cobblemon.ability.prankster.desc: Gives priority to a status move.
cobblemon.ability.pressure.desc: By putting pressure on the opposing Pokémon, it raises their PP usage.
cobblemon.ability.primordialsea.desc: The Pokémon changes the weather to nullify Fire-type attacks.
cobblemon.ability.prismarmor.desc: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.
cobblemon.ability.propellertail.desc: Ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon's Abilities and moves that draw in moves.
cobblemon.ability.protean.desc: Changes the Pokémon's type to the type of the move it's about to use.
cobblemon.ability.protosynthesis.desc: If Sunny Day is active or this Pokemon uses a held Booster Energy, this Pokemon's highest stat is multiplied by 1.3, or by 1.5 if the highest stat is Speed. Stat stage changes are considered at the time this Ability activates. If multiple stats are tied, Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed are prioritized in that order. If this effect was started by Sunny Day, a held Booster Energy will not activate and the effect ends when Sunny Day is no longer active. If this effect was started by a held Booster Energy, it ends when this Pokemon is no longer active.
cobblemon.ability.psychicsurge.desc: Turns the ground into Psychic Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
cobblemon.ability.punkrock.desc: Boosts the power of sound-based moves. The Pokémon also takes half the damage from these kinds of moves.
cobblemon.ability.purepower.desc: Using its pure power, the Pokémon doubles its Attack stat.
cobblemon.ability.purifyingsalt.desc: This Pokemon cannot become affected by a non-volatile status condition or Yawn. If a Pokemon uses a Ghost-type attack against this Pokemon, that Pokemon's offensive stat is halved when calculating the damage to this Pokemon.
cobblemon.ability.quarkdrive.desc: If Electric Terrain is active or this Pokemon uses a held Booster Energy, this Pokemon's highest stat is multiplied by 1.3, or by 1.5 if the highest stat is Speed. Stat stage changes are considered at the time this Ability activates. If multiple stats are tied, Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed are prioritized in that order. If this effect was started by Electric Terrain, a held Booster Energy will not activate and the effect ends when Electric Terrain is no longer active. If this effect was started by a held Booster Energy, it ends when this Pokemon is no longer active.
cobblemon.ability.queenlymajesty.desc: Its majesty pressures the opposing Pokémon, making it unable to attack using priority moves.
cobblemon.ability.quickdraw.desc: Enables the Pokémon to move first occasionally.
cobblemon.ability.quickfeet.desc: Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokémon has a status condition.
cobblemon.ability.raindish.desc: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in rain.
cobblemon.ability.rattled.desc: Dark-, Ghost-, and Bug-type moves scare the Pokémon and boost its Speed stat.
cobblemon.ability.receiver.desc: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.
cobblemon.ability.reckless.desc: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.
cobblemon.ability.refrigerate.desc: Normal-type moves become Ice-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.
cobblemon.ability.regenerator.desc: Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.
cobblemon.ability.ripen.desc: Ripens Berries and doubles their effect.
cobblemon.ability.rivalry.desc: Becomes competitive and deals more damage to Pokémon of the same gender, but deals less to Pokémon of the opposite gender.
cobblemon.ability.rkssystem.desc: Changes the Pokémon's type to match the memory disc it holds.
cobblemon.ability.rockhead.desc: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.
cobblemon.ability.rockypayload.desc: This Pokemon's offensive stat is multiplied by 1.5 while using a Rock-type attack.
cobblemon.ability.roughskin.desc: This Pokémon inflicts damage with its rough skin to the attacker on contact.
cobblemon.ability.runaway.desc: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.
cobblemon.ability.sandforce.desc: Boosts the power of Rock-, Ground-, and Steel-type moves in a sandstorm.
cobblemon.ability.sandrush.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in a sandstorm.
cobblemon.ability.sandspit.desc: The Pokémon creates a sandstorm when it's hit by an attack.
cobblemon.ability.sandstream.desc: The Pokémon summons a sandstorm when it enters a battle.
cobblemon.ability.sandveil.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's evasiveness in a sandstorm.
cobblemon.ability.sapsipper.desc: Boosts the Attack stat if hit by a Grass-type move instead of taking damage.
cobblemon.ability.schooling.desc: When it has a lot of HP, the Pokémon forms a powerful school. It stops schooling when its HP is low.
cobblemon.ability.scrappy.desc: The Pokémon can hit Ghost-type Pokémon with Normal- and Fighting-type moves.
cobblemon.ability.screencleaner.desc: When the Pokémon enters a battle, the effects of Light Screen, Reflect, and Aurora Veil are nullified for both opposing and ally Pokémon.
cobblemon.ability.seedsower.desc: When this Pokemon is hit by an attack, the effect of Grassy Terrain begins.
cobblemon.ability.serenegrace.desc: Boosts the likelihood of additional effects occurring when attacking.
cobblemon.ability.shadowshield.desc: Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes while its HP is full.
cobblemon.ability.shadowtag.desc: This Pokémon steps on the opposing Pokémon's shadow to prevent it from escaping.
cobblemon.ability.sharpness.desc: This Pokemon's slicing moves have their power multiplied by 1.5.
cobblemon.ability.shedskin.desc: The Pokémon may heal its own status conditions by shedding its skin.
cobblemon.ability.sheerforce.desc: Removes additional effects to increase the power of moves when attacking.
cobblemon.ability.shellarmor.desc: A hard shell protects the Pokémon from critical hits.
cobblemon.ability.shielddust.desc: This Pokémon's dust blocks the additional effects of attacks taken.
cobblemon.ability.shieldsdown.desc: When its HP becomes half or less, the Pokémon's shell breaks and it becomes aggressive.
cobblemon.ability.simple.desc: The stat changes the Pokémon receives are doubled.
cobblemon.ability.skilllink.desc: Maximizes the number of times multistrike moves hit.
cobblemon.ability.slowstart.desc: For five turns, the Pokémon's Attack and Speed stats are halved.
cobblemon.ability.slushrush.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in a hailstorm.
cobblemon.ability.sniper.desc: Powers up moves if they become critical hits when attacking.
cobblemon.ability.snowwarning.desc: The Pokémon summons a hailstorm when it enters a battle.
cobblemon.ability.solarpower.desc: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat in harsh sunlight, but HP decreases every turn.
cobblemon.ability.solidrock.desc: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.
cobblemon.ability.soulheart.desc: Boosts its Sp. Atk stat every time a Pokémon faints.
cobblemon.ability.soundproof.desc: Soundproofing gives the Pokémon full immunity to all sound-based moves.
cobblemon.ability.speedboost.desc: Its Speed stat is boosted every turn.
cobblemon.ability.stakeout.desc: Doubles the damage dealt to the target's replacement if the target switches out.
cobblemon.ability.stall.desc: The Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.
cobblemon.ability.stalwart.desc: Ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon's Abilities and moves that draw in moves.
cobblemon.ability.stamina.desc: Boosts the Defense stat when hit by an attack.
cobblemon.ability.stancechange.desc: The Pokémon changes its form to Blade Forme when it uses an attack move and changes to Shield Forme when it uses King's Shield.
cobblemon.ability.static.desc: The Pokémon is charged with static electricity, so contact with it may cause paralysis.
cobblemon.ability.steadfast.desc: The Pokémon's determination boosts the Speed stat each time the Pokémon flinches.
cobblemon.ability.steamengine.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat drastically if hit by a Fire- or Water-type move.
cobblemon.ability.steelyspirit.desc: Powers up ally Pokémon's Steel-type moves.
cobblemon.ability.stench.desc: By releasing stench when attacking, this Pokémon may cause the target to flinch.
cobblemon.ability.stickyhold.desc: Items held by the Pokémon are stuck fast and cannot be removed by other Pokémon.
cobblemon.ability.stormdrain.desc: Draws in all Water-type moves. Instead of being hit by Water-type moves, it boosts its Sp. Atk.
cobblemon.ability.strongjaw.desc: The Pokémon's strong jaw boosts the power of its biting moves.
cobblemon.ability.sturdy.desc: It cannot be knocked out with one hit. One-hit KO moves cannot knock it out, either.
cobblemon.ability.suctioncups.desc: This Pokémon uses suction cups to stay in one spot to negate all moves and items that force switching out.
cobblemon.ability.superluck.desc: The Pokémon is so lucky that the critical-hit ratios of its moves are boosted.
cobblemon.ability.supersweetsyrup.desc: Lowers the evasion of opposing Pok�mon by 1 stage when first sent into battle
cobblemon.ability.supremeoverlord.desc: This Pokemon's moves have their power multiplied by 1+(X*0.1), where X is the total number of times any Pokemon has fainted on the user's side when this Ability became active, and X cannot be greater than 5.
cobblemon.ability.surgesurfer.desc: Doubles the Pokémon's Speed stat on Electric Terrain.
cobblemon.ability.swarm.desc: Powers up Bug-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.
cobblemon.ability.sweetveil.desc: Prevents itself and ally Pokémon from falling asleep.
cobblemon.ability.swiftswim.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in rain.
cobblemon.ability.swordofruin.desc: The Defense stat of all other active Pokemon is multiplied by 0.75.
cobblemon.ability.symbiosis.desc: The Pokémon passes its item to an ally that has used up an item.
cobblemon.ability.synchronize.desc: The attacker will receive the same status condition if it inflicts a burn, poison, or paralysis to the Pokémon.
cobblemon.ability.tabletsofruin.desc: The Attack stat of all other active Pokemon is multiplied by 0.75.
cobblemon.ability.tangledfeet.desc: Raises evasiveness if the Pokémon is confused.
cobblemon.ability.tanglinghair.desc: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.
cobblemon.ability.technician.desc: Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves.
cobblemon.ability.telepathy.desc: Anticipates an ally's attack and dodges it.
cobblemon.ability.teraformzero.desc: When Terapagos changes into its Stellar Form, it uses its hidden powers to eliminate all effects of weather and terrain, reducing them to zero.
cobblemon.ability.terashell.desc: The Pokémon's shell contains the powers of each type. All damage-dealing moves that hit the Pokémon when its HP is full will not be very effective.
cobblemon.ability.terashift.desc: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it absorbs the energy around itself and transforms into its Terastal Form.
cobblemon.ability.teravolt.desc: Moves can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.
cobblemon.ability.thermalexchange.desc: This Pokemon's Attack is raised 1 stage after it is damaged by a Fire-type move. This Pokemon cannot be burned. Gaining this Ability while burned cures it.
cobblemon.ability.thickfat.desc: The Pokémon is protected by a layer of thick fat, which halves the damage taken from Fire- and Ice-type moves.
cobblemon.ability.tintedlens.desc: The Pokémon can use «not very effective» moves to deal regular damage.
cobblemon.ability.torrent.desc: Powers up Water-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.
cobblemon.ability.toughclaws.desc: Powers up moves that make direct contact.
cobblemon.ability.toxicboost.desc: Powers up physical attacks when the Pokémon is poisoned.
cobblemon.ability.toxicchain.desc: The power of the Pokémon's toxic chain may badly poison any target the Pok�mon hits with a move
cobblemon.ability.toxicdebris.desc: If this Pokémon is hit by a physical attack, Toxic Spikes are set on the opposing side.
cobblemon.ability.trace.desc: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon copies an opposing Pokémon's Ability.
cobblemon.ability.triage.desc: Gives priority to a healing move.
cobblemon.ability.truant.desc: The Pokémon can't use a move if it had used a move on the previous turn.
cobblemon.ability.turboblaze.desc: Moves can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.
cobblemon.ability.unaware.desc: When attacking, the Pokémon ignores the target Pokémon's stat changes.
cobblemon.ability.unburden.desc: Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokémon's held item is used or lost.
cobblemon.ability.unnerve.desc: Unnerves opposing Pokémon and makes them unable to eat Berries.
cobblemon.ability.unseenfist.desc: If the Pokémon uses moves that make direct contact, it can attack the target even if the target protects itself.
cobblemon.ability.vesselofruin.desc: The Special Attack stat of all other active Pokemon is multiplied by 0.75.
cobblemon.ability.victorystar.desc: Boosts the accuracy of its allies and itself.
cobblemon.ability.vitalspirit.desc: The Pokémon is full of vitality, and that prevents it from falling asleep.
cobblemon.ability.voltabsorb.desc: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move instead of taking damage.
cobblemon.ability.wanderingspirit.desc: The Pokémon exchanges Abilities with a Pokémon that hits it with a move that makes direct contact.
cobblemon.ability.waterabsorb.desc: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move instead of taking damage.
cobblemon.ability.waterbubble.desc: Lowers the power of Fire-type moves done to the Pokémon and prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.
cobblemon.ability.watercompaction.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Defense stat sharply when hit by a Water-type move.
cobblemon.ability.waterveil.desc: The Pokémon is covered with a water veil, which prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.
cobblemon.ability.weakarmor.desc: Physical attacks to the Pokémon lower its Defense stat but sharply raise its Speed stat.
cobblemon.ability.wellbakedbody.desc: This Pokemon is immune to Fire-type moves and raises its Defense by 2 stages when hit by a Fire-type move.
cobblemon.ability.whitesmoke.desc: The Pokémon is protected by its white smoke, which prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.
cobblemon.ability.wimpout.desc: The Pokémon cowardly switches out when its HP becomes half or less.
cobblemon.ability.windpower.desc: This Pokemon gains the Charge effect when it takes a hit from a wind move or when Tailwind begins on this Pokemon's side.
cobblemon.ability.windrider.desc: This Pokemon is immune to wind moves and raises its Attack by 1 stage when hit by a wind move or when Tailwind begins on this Pokemon's side.
cobblemon.ability.wonderguard.desc: Its mysterious power only lets supereffective moves hit the Pokémon.
cobblemon.ability.wonderskin.desc: Makes status moves more likely to miss.
cobblemon.ability.zenmode.desc: Changes the Pokémon's shape when HP is half or less.
cobblemon.ability.zerotohero.desc: If this Pokemon is a Palafin in Zero Form, switching out has it change to Hero Form.

cobblemon.battle.sidestart.luckychant: Lucky Chant shielded %1$s team from critical hits!
cobblemon.battle.sidestart.reflect: Reflect made %1$s team stronger against physical moves!
cobblemon.battle.sidestart.safeguard: %1$s team cloaked itself in a mystical veil!
cobblemon.battle.sidestart.spikes: Spikes were scattered on the ground all around %1$s team!
cobblemon.battle.sidestart.stealthrock: Polished stones float in the air around %1$s team!
cobblemon.battle.sidestart.stickyweb: A sticky web has been laid on the ground around %1$s team!
cobblemon.battle.sidestart.tailwind: The Tailwind blew from behind %1$s team!
cobblemon.battle.sidestart.toxicspikes: Poison spikes were scattered on the ground all around %1$s team!
cobblemon.battle.singlemove.destinybond: %1$s is hoping to take its attacker down with it!
cobblemon.battle.singlemove.glaiverush: %1$s throws itself into a reckless charge!
cobblemon.battle.singlemove.grudge: %1$s wants its target to bear a grudge!
cobblemon.battle.singleturn.matblock: %1$s intends to flip up a mat and block incoming attacks!
cobblemon.battle.singleturn.snatch: %1$s is waiting for a target to make a move!
cobblemon.battle.start.aquaring: %1$s surrounded itself with a veil of water!
cobblemon.battle.start.curse: %1$s cut its own HP and put a curse on %2$s!
cobblemon.battle.start.doomdesire: %1$s chose Doom Desire as its destiny!
cobblemon.battle.start.doubleshock: %1$s used up all of its electricity!
cobblemon.battle.start.imprison: %1$s sealed any moves its target shares with it!
cobblemon.battle.start.noretreat: %1$s can no longer escape because it used No Retreat!
cobblemon.battle.start.octolock: %1$s can no longer escape because of Octolock!
cobblemon.battle.start.powershift: %1$s swapped its offensive stats with its defensive stats!
cobblemon.battle.start.reflecttype: %1$s's type became the same as %2$s's type!
cobblemon.battle.start.shedtail: %1$s shed its tail to create a decoy!
cobblemon.battle.start.snatch: %1$s is waiting for a target to make a move!
cobblemon.battle.swapboost.guardswap: %1$s switched all changes to its Defense and Sp. Def with its target!
cobblemon.battle.swapboost.heartswap: %1$s switched stat changes with its target!
cobblemon.battle.swapboost.powerswap: %1$s switched all changes to its Attack and Sp. Atk with its target!
cobblemon.battle.throw_pokeball_prompt: Бросьте покебол в своего оппонента, чтобы поймать его.
cobblemon.battle.ui.forfeit_confirmation: Forfeiting makes you lose the battle. Are you sure?
cobblemon.battle.zbroken: %1$s couldn't fully protect itself and got hurt!
cobblemon.capture.in_battle: That %1$s is in a battle and cannot be caught by you.
cobblemon.capture.not_single: You can only capture wild Pokémon in a 1v1 battle.
cobblemon.capture.not_your_turn: It's not your turn to act.
cobblemon.command.checkspawns.nothing: Nothing can spawn here right now.
cobblemon.command.clearparty.nonethere: There are no Pokémon in %1$s's party.
cobblemon.command.general.invalid-party-: There is no Pokémon in slot %1$s!
cobblemon.command.givepokemon.nospecies: Error: You need to include a Pokémon name or 'random'
cobblemon.command.pokebox.box_does_not_e: That Player does not have a box %1$s.
cobblemon.command.pokebox.last_pokemon: Did not send that Player's last Pokémon to the PC.
cobblemon.command.pokeheal.in_battle: You cannot heal your party while in a battle!
cobblemon.command.spawnpokemon.nospecies: Error: You need to include a Pokémon name or 'random'
cobblemon.command.spawnpokemonfrompool: A %1$s has spawned in the area.
cobblemon.drop.item.full: Your inventory was full so the %1$s dropped to the ground.
cobblemon.healingmachine.alreadyhealed: Your Pokémon party is already fully healed!
cobblemon.healingmachine.alreadyhealing: Your Pokémon party is already in a different healer!
cobblemon.healingmachine.alreadyinuse: This healing machine is already in use!
cobblemon.healingmachine.healed: Your Pokémon party has been healed!
cobblemon.healingmachine.healing: Your Pokémon party is being healed!
cobblemon.healingmachine.inbattle: Вам недоступна исцеляющая машина во время битвы!
cobblemon.healingmachine.nopokemon: You don't have any Pokémon in your party to heal!
cobblemon.healingmachine.notenoughcharge: This machine needs %s more charge to heal your party!
cobblemon.held_item.replace: You retrieved %1$s from %2$s and gave it %3$s to hold.
cobblemon.interaction.status.cure: %1$s is cured of its status condition!
cobblemon.move.10000000voltthunderbolt.d: The user, Pikachu wearing a cap, powers up a jolt of electricity using its Z-Power and unleashes it. Critical hits land more easily.
cobblemon.move.absorb.desc: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
cobblemon.move.accelerock.desc: The user smashes into the target at high speed. This move always goes first.
cobblemon.move.acid.desc: Opposing Pokémon are attacked with a spray of harsh acid. This may also lower their Sp. Def stats.
cobblemon.move.acidarmor.desc: The user alters its cellular structure to liquefy itself, sharply raising its Defense stat.
cobblemon.move.aciddownpour.desc: The user creates a poisonous swamp using its Z-Power and sinks the target into it at full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.
cobblemon.move.acidspray.desc: The user spits fluid that works to melt the target. This harshly lowers the target's Sp. Def stat.
cobblemon.move.acrobatics.desc: The user nimbly strikes the target. If the user is not holding an item, this attack inflicts massive damage.
cobblemon.move.acupressure.desc: The user applies pressure to stress points, sharply boosting one of its or its allies' stats.
cobblemon.move.aerialace.desc: The user confounds the target with speed, then slashes. This attack never misses.
cobblemon.move.aeroblast.desc: A vortex of air is shot at the target to inflict damage. Critical hits land more easily.
cobblemon.move.afteryou.desc: The user helps the target and makes it use its move right after the user.
cobblemon.move.agility.desc: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. This sharply raises the Speed stat.
cobblemon.move.aircutter.desc: The user launches razor-like wind to slash opposing Pokémon. Critical hits land more easily.
cobblemon.move.airslash.desc: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. This may also make the target flinch.
cobblemon.move.alloutpummeling.desc: The user rams an energy orb created by its Z-Power into the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.
cobblemon.move.allyswitch.desc: The user teleports using a strange power and switches places with one of its allies.
cobblemon.move.amnesia.desc: The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns. This sharply raises the user's Sp. Def stat.
cobblemon.move.anchorshot.desc: The user entangles the target with its anchor chain while attacking. The target becomes unable to flee.
cobblemon.move.ancientpower.desc: The user attacks with a prehistoric power. This may also raise all the user's stats at once.
cobblemon.move.appleacid.desc: The user attacks the target with an acidic liquid created from tart apples. This also lowers the target's Sp. Def stat.
cobblemon.move.aquacutter.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
cobblemon.move.aquajet.desc: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. This move always goes first.
cobblemon.move.aquaring.desc: The user envelops itself in a veil made of water. It regains some HP every turn.
cobblemon.move.aquastep.desc: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1 stage.
cobblemon.move.aquatail.desc: The user attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.
cobblemon.move.armorcannon.desc: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.
cobblemon.move.armthrust.desc: The user lets loose a flurry of open-palmed arm thrusts that hit two to five times in a row.
cobblemon.move.aromatherapy.desc: The user releases a soothing scent that heals all status conditions affecting the user's party.
cobblemon.move.aromaticmist.desc: The user raises the Sp. Def stat of an ally Pokémon by using a mysterious aroma.
cobblemon.move.assist.desc: The user hurriedly and randomly uses a move among those known by ally Pokémon.
cobblemon.move.assurance.desc: If the target has already taken some damage in the same turn, this attack's power is doubled.
cobblemon.move.astonish.desc: The user attacks the target while shouting in a startling fashion. This may also make the target flinch.
cobblemon.move.astralbarrage.desc: The user attacks by sending a frightful amount of small ghosts at opposing Pokémon.
cobblemon.move.attackorder.desc: The user calls out its underlings to pummel the target. Critical hits land more easily.
cobblemon.move.attract.desc: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.
cobblemon.move.aurasphere.desc: The user lets loose a blast of aura power from deep within its body at the target. This attack never misses.
cobblemon.move.aurawheel.desc: Morpeko attacks and raises its Speed with the energy stored in its cheeks. This move's type changes depending on the user's form.
cobblemon.move.aurorabeam.desc: The target is hit with a rainbow-colored beam. This may also lower the target's Attack stat.
cobblemon.move.auroraveil.desc: This move reduces damage from physical and special moves for five turns. This can be used only in a hailstorm.
cobblemon.move.autotomize.desc: The user sheds part of its body to make itself lighter and sharply raise its Speed stat.
cobblemon.move.avalanche.desc: The power of this attack move is doubled if the user has been hurt by the target in the same turn.
cobblemon.move.axekick.desc: Has a 30% chance to confuse the target. If this attack is not successful, the user loses half of its maximum HP, rounded down, as crash damage. Pokemon with the Magic Guard Ability are unaffected by crash damage.
cobblemon.move.babydolleyes.desc: The user stares at the target with its baby-doll eyes, which lowers the target's Attack stat. This move always goes first.
cobblemon.move.baddybad.desc: The user acts bad and attacks the target. A wondrous wall of light is put up to weaken the power of the opposing Pokémon's physical moves.
cobblemon.move.banefulbunker.desc: In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this move also poisons any attacker that makes direct contact.
cobblemon.move.barbbarrage.desc: Has a 50% chance to poison the target. Power doubles if the target is already poisoned.
cobblemon.move.barrage.desc: Round objects are hurled at the target to strike two to five times in a row.
cobblemon.move.barrier.desc: The user throws up a sturdy wall that sharply raises its Defense stat.
cobblemon.move.batonpass.desc: The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting and passes along any stat changes.
cobblemon.move.beakblast.desc: The user first heats up its beak, and then it attacks the target. Making direct contact with the Pokémon while it's heating up its beak results in a burn.
cobblemon.move.beatup.desc: The user gets all party Pokémon to attack the target. The more party Pokémon, the greater the number of attacks.
cobblemon.move.behemothbash.desc: The user becomes a gigantic shield and slams into the target. This move deals twice the damage if the target is Dynamaxed.
cobblemon.move.behemothblade.desc: The user becomes a gigantic sword and cuts the target. This move deals twice the damage if the target is Dynamaxed.
cobblemon.move.belch.desc: The user lets out a damaging belch at the target. The user must eat a held Berry to use this move.
cobblemon.move.bellydrum.desc: The user maximizes its Attack stat in exchange for HP equal to half its max HP.
cobblemon.move.bestow.desc: The user passes its held item to the target when the target isn't holding an item.
cobblemon.move.bide.desc: The user endures attacks for two turns, then strikes back to cause double the damage taken.
cobblemon.move.bind.desc: Things such as long bodies or tentacles are used to bind and squeeze the target for four to five turns.
cobblemon.move.bite.desc: Цель кусают острыми, как бритва, клыками. Это также может заставить цель дрогнуть.
cobblemon.move.bitterblade.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
cobblemon.move.bittermalice.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage.
cobblemon.move.blackholeeclipse.desc: The user gathers dark energy using its Z-Power and sucks the target into it. The power varies, depending on the original move.
cobblemon.move.blastburn.desc: The target is razed by a fiery explosion. The user can't move on the next turn.
cobblemon.move.blazekick.desc: The user launches a kick that lands a critical hit more easily. This may also leave the target with a burn.
cobblemon.move.blazingtorque.desc: Has a 30% chance to burn the target.
cobblemon.move.bleakwindstorm.desc: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
cobblemon.move.blizzard.desc: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing Pokémon frozen.
cobblemon.move.block.desc: The user blocks the target's way with arms spread wide to prevent escape.
cobblemon.move.bloomdoom.desc: The user collects energy from plants using its Z-Power and attacks the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.
cobblemon.move.blueflare.desc: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense, yet beautiful, blue flame. This may also leave the target with a burn.
cobblemon.move.bodypress.desc: The user attacks by slamming its body into the target. The higher the user's Defense, the more damage it can inflict on the target.
cobblemon.move.bodyslam.desc: The user drops onto the target with its full body weight. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
cobblemon.move.boltbeak.desc: The user stabs the target with its electrified beak. If the user attacks before the target, the power of this move is doubled.
cobblemon.move.boltstrike.desc: The user surrounds itself with a great amount of electricity and charges its target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
cobblemon.move.boneclub.desc: The user clubs the target with a bone. This may also make the target flinch.
cobblemon.move.bonemerang.desc: The user throws the bone it holds. The bone loops around to hit the target twice—coming and going.
cobblemon.move.bonerush.desc: The user strikes the target with a hard bone two to five times in a row.
cobblemon.move.boomburst.desc: The user attacks everything around it with the destructive power of a terrible, explosive sound.
cobblemon.move.bounce.desc: The user bounces up high, then drops on the target on the second turn. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
cobblemon.move.bouncybubble.desc: The user attacks by shooting water bubbles at the target. It then absorbs water and restores its HP by half the damage taken by the target.
cobblemon.move.branchpoke.desc: The user attacks the target by poking it with a sharply pointed branch.
cobblemon.move.bravebird.desc: The user tucks in its wings and charges from a low altitude. This also damages the user quite a lot.
cobblemon.move.breakingswipe.desc: The user swings its tough tail wildly and attacks opposing Pokémon. This also lowers their Attack stats.
cobblemon.move.breakneckblitz.desc: The user builds up its momentum using its Z-Power and crashes into the target at full speed. The power varies, depending on the original move.
cobblemon.move.brickbreak.desc: The user attacks with a swift chop. It can also break barriers, such as Light Screen and Reflect.
cobblemon.move.brine.desc: If the target's HP is half or less, this attack will hit with double the power.
cobblemon.move.brutalswing.desc: The user swings its body around violently to inflict damage on everything in its vicinity.
cobblemon.move.bubble.desc: A spray of countless bubbles is jetted at the opposing Pokémon. This may also lower their Speed stat.
cobblemon.move.bubblebeam.desc: A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected at the target. This may also lower the target's Speed stat.
cobblemon.move.bugbite.desc: The user bites the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.
cobblemon.move.bugbuzz.desc: The user generates a damaging sound wave by vibration. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.
cobblemon.move.bulkup.desc: The user tenses its muscles to bulk up its body, raising both its Attack and Defense stats.
cobblemon.move.bulldoze.desc: The user strikes everything around it by stomping down on the ground. This lowers the Speed stats of those hit.
cobblemon.move.bulletpunch.desc: The user strikes the target with tough punches as fast as bullets. This move always goes first.
cobblemon.move.bulletseed.desc: The user forcefully shoots seeds at the target two to five times in a row.
cobblemon.move.burningjealousy.desc: The user attacks with energy from jealousy. This leaves all opposing Pokémon that have had their stats boosted during the turn with a burn.
cobblemon.move.burnup.desc: To inflict massive damage, the user burns itself out. After using this move, the user will no longer be Fire type.
cobblemon.move.buzzybuzz.desc: The user shoots a jolt of electricity to attack the target. This also leaves the target with paralysis.
cobblemon.move.calmmind.desc: The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.
cobblemon.move.camouflage.desc: The user's type is changed depending on its environment, such as at water's edge, in grass, or in a cave.
cobblemon.move.captivate.desc: If any opposing Pokémon is the opposite gender of the user, it is charmed, which harshly lowers its Sp. Atk stat.
cobblemon.move.catastropika.desc: The user, Pikachu, surrounds itself with the maximum amount of electricity using its Z-Power and pounces on its target with full force.
cobblemon.move.ceaselessedge.desc: If this move is successful, it sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, damaging each opposing Pokemon that switches in, unless it is a Flying-type Pokemon or has the Levitate Ability. A maximum of three layers may be set, and opponents lose 1/8 of their maximum HP with one layer, 1/6 of their maximum HP with two layers, and 1/4 of their maximum HP with three layers, all rounded down. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Defog successfully, or is hit by Defog.
cobblemon.move.celebrate.desc: The Pokémon congratulates you on your special day!
cobblemon.move.charge.desc: The user boosts the power of the Electric move it uses on the next turn. This also raises the user's Sp. Def stat.
cobblemon.move.chargebeam.desc: The user attacks the target with an electric charge. The user may use any remaining electricity to raise its Sp. Atk stat.
cobblemon.move.charm.desc: The user gazes at the target rather charmingly, making it less wary. This harshly lowers the target's Attack stat.
cobblemon.move.chatter.desc: The user attacks the target with sound waves of deafening chatter. This confuses the target.
cobblemon.move.chillingwater.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage.
cobblemon.move.chillyreception.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Snow. The user switches out even if it is trapped and is replaced immediately by a selected party member. The user does not switch out if there are no unfainted party members.
cobblemon.move.chipaway.desc: Looking for an opening, the user strikes consistently. The target's stat changes don't affect this attack's damage.
cobblemon.move.chloroblast.desc: Whether or not this move is successful and even if it would cause fainting, the user loses 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded up, unless the user has the Magic Guard Ability.
cobblemon.move.circlethrow.desc: The target is thrown, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.
cobblemon.move.clamp.desc: The target is clamped and squeezed by the user's very thick and sturdy shell for four to five turns.
cobblemon.move.clangingscales.desc: The user rubs the scales on its entire body and makes a huge noise to attack opposing Pokémon. The user's Defense stat goes down after the attack.
cobblemon.move.clangoroussoul.desc: The user raises all its stats by using some of its HP.
cobblemon.move.clangoroussoulblaze.desc: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Kommo-o, attacks the opposing Pokémon with full force. This move boosts the user's stats.
cobblemon.move.clearsmog.desc: The user attacks the target by throwing a clump of special mud. All stat changes are returned to normal.
cobblemon.move.closecombat.desc: The user fights the target up close without guarding itself. This also lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def stats.
cobblemon.move.coaching.desc: The user properly coaches its ally Pokémon, boosting their Attack and Defense stats.
cobblemon.move.coil.desc: The user coils up and concentrates. This raises its Attack and Defense stats as well as its accuracy.
cobblemon.move.collisioncourse.desc: Damage is multiplied by 1.3333 if this move is super effective against the target.
cobblemon.move.combattorque.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
cobblemon.move.cometpunch.desc: The target is hit with a flurry of punches that strike two to five times in a row.
cobblemon.move.comeuppance.desc: Deals damage to the last opposing Pokemon to hit the user with a physical or special attack this turn equal to 1.5 times the HP lost by the user from that attack, rounded down. If the user did not lose HP from that attack, this move deals 1 HP of damage instead. If that opposing Pokemon's position is no longer in use and there is another opposing Pokemon on the field, the damage is done to it instead. Only the last hit of a multi-hit attack is counted. Fails if the user was not hit by an opposing Pokemon's physical or special attack this turn.
cobblemon.move.confide.desc: The user tells the target a secret, and the target loses its ability to concentrate. This lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.
cobblemon.move.confuseray.desc: The target is exposed to a sinister ray that triggers confusion.
cobblemon.move.confusion.desc: The target is hit by a weak telekinetic force. This may also confuse the target.
cobblemon.move.constrict.desc: The target is attacked with long, creeping tentacles, vines, or the like. This may also lower the target's Speed stat.
cobblemon.move.continentalcrush.desc: The user summons a huge rock mountain using its Z-Power and drops it onto the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.
cobblemon.move.conversion.desc: The user changes its type to become the same type as the move at the top of the list of moves it knows.
cobblemon.move.conversion2.desc: The user changes its type to make itself resistant to the type of the attack the target used last.
cobblemon.move.copycat.desc: The user mimics the move used immediately before it. The move fails if no other move has been used yet.
cobblemon.move.coreenforcer.desc: If the Pokémon the user has inflicted damage on have already used their moves, this move eliminates the effect of the target's Ability.
cobblemon.move.corkscrewcrash.desc: The user spins very fast and rams into the target with the full force of its Z-Power. The power varies, depending on the original move.
cobblemon.move.corrosivegas.desc: The user surrounds everything around it with highly acidic gas and melts away items they hold.
cobblemon.move.cosmicpower.desc: The user absorbs a mystical power from space to raise its Defense and Sp. Def stats.
cobblemon.move.cottonguard.desc: The user protects itself by wrapping its body in soft cotton, which drastically raises the user's Defense stat.
cobblemon.move.cottonspore.desc: The user releases cotton-like spores that cling to opposing Pokémon, which harshly lowers their Speed stats.
cobblemon.move.counter.desc: A retaliation move that counters any physical attack, inflicting double the damage taken.
cobblemon.move.courtchange.desc: With its mysterious power, the user swaps the effects on either side of the field.
cobblemon.move.covet.desc: The user endearingly approaches the target, then steals the target's held item.
cobblemon.move.crabhammer.desc: The target is hammered with a large pincer. Critical hits land more easily.
cobblemon.move.craftyshield.desc: The user protects itself and its allies from status moves with a mysterious power. This does not stop moves that do damage.
cobblemon.move.crosschop.desc: The user delivers a double chop with its forearms crossed. Critical hits land more easily.
cobblemon.move.crosspoison.desc: A slashing attack with a poisonous blade that may also poison the target. Critical hits land more easily.
cobblemon.move.crunch.desc: The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.
cobblemon.move.crushclaw.desc: The user slashes the target with hard and sharp claws. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.
cobblemon.move.crushgrip.desc: The target is crushed with great force. The more HP the target has left, the greater this move's power.
cobblemon.move.curse.desc: A move that works differently for the Ghost type than for all other types.
cobblemon.move.cut.desc: The target is cut with a scythe or claw.
cobblemon.move.darkestlariat.desc: The user swings both arms and hits the target. The target's stat changes don't affect this attack's damage.
cobblemon.move.darkpulse.desc: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark thoughts. This may also make the target flinch.
cobblemon.move.darkvoid.desc: Opposing Pokémon are dragged into a world of total darkness that makes them sleep.
cobblemon.move.dazzlinggleam.desc: The user damages opposing Pokémon by emitting a powerful flash.
cobblemon.move.decorate.desc: The user sharply raises the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats by decorating the target.
cobblemon.move.defendorder.desc: The user calls out its underlings to shield its body, raising its Defense and Sp. Def stats.
cobblemon.move.defensecurl.desc: The user curls up to conceal weak spots and raise its Defense stat.
cobblemon.move.defog.desc: A strong wind blows away the target's barriers such as Reflect or Light Screen. This also lowers the target's evasiveness.
cobblemon.move.destinybond.desc: After using this move, if the user faints, the Pokémon that landed the knockout hit also faints. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
cobblemon.move.detect.desc: This move enables the user to protect itself from all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
cobblemon.move.devastatingdrake.desc: The user materializes its aura using its Z-Power and attacks the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.
cobblemon.move.diamondstorm.desc: The user whips up a storm of diamonds to damage opposing Pokémon. This may also sharply raise the user's Defense stat.
cobblemon.move.dig.desc: The user burrows into the ground, then attacks on the next turn.
cobblemon.move.direclaw.desc: Has a 50% chance to cause the target to either fall asleep, become poisoned, or become paralyzed.
cobblemon.move.disable.desc: For four turns, this move prevents the target from using the move it last used.
cobblemon.move.disarmingvoice.desc: Letting out a charming cry, the user does emotional damage to opposing Pokémon. This attack never misses.
cobblemon.move.discharge.desc: The user strikes everything around it by letting loose a flare of electricity. This may also cause paralysis.
cobblemon.move.dive.desc: Diving on the first turn, the user floats up and attacks on the next turn.
cobblemon.move.dizzypunch.desc: The target is hit with rhythmically launched punches. This may also leave the target confused.
cobblemon.move.doodle.desc: The user and its ally's Abilities change to match the target's Ability. Does not change Ability if the user's or its ally's is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Commander, Disguise, Gulp Missile, Hadron Engine, Ice Face, Multitype, Orichalcum Pulse, Power Construct, Protosynthesis, Quark Drive, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Zen Mode, Zero to Hero, or already matches the target. Fails if both the user and its ally's Ability already matches the target, or if the target's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Commander, Disguise, Flower Gift, Forecast, Gulp Missile, Hadron Engine, Hunger Switch, Ice Face, Illusion, Imposter, Multitype, Neutralizing Gas, Orichalcum Pulse, Power Construct, Power of Alchemy, Protosynthesis, Quark Drive, Receiver, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Trace, Wonder Guard, Zen Mode, or Zero to Hero.
cobblemon.move.doomdesire.desc: Two turns after this move is used, a concentrated bundle of light blasts the target.
cobblemon.move.doubleedge.desc: A reckless, life-risking tackle in which the user rushes the target. This also damages the user quite a lot.
cobblemon.move.doublehit.desc: The user slams the target with a long tail, vines, or a tentacle. The target is hit twice in a row.
cobblemon.move.doubleironbash.desc: The user rotates, centering the hex nut in its chest, and then strikes with its arms twice in a row. This may also make the target flinch.
cobblemon.move.doublekick.desc: The target is quickly kicked twice in succession using both feet.
cobblemon.move.doubleshock.desc: Fails unless the user is an Electric type. If this move is successful and the user is not Terastallized, the user's Electric type becomes typeless as long as it remains active.
cobblemon.move.doubleslap.desc: The target is slapped repeatedly, back and forth, two to five times in a row.
cobblemon.move.doubleteam.desc: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.
cobblemon.move.dracometeor.desc: Comets are summoned down from the sky onto the target. The attack's recoil harshly lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat.
cobblemon.move.dragonascent.desc: After soaring upward, the user attacks its target by dropping out of the sky at high speeds. But it lowers its own Defense and Sp. Def stats in the process.
cobblemon.move.dragonbreath.desc: The user exhales a mighty gust that inflicts damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
cobblemon.move.dragonclaw.desc: The user slashes the target with huge sharp claws.
cobblemon.move.dragondance.desc: The user vigorously performs a mystic, powerful dance that raises its Attack and Speed stats.
cobblemon.move.dragondarts.desc: The user attacks twice using Dreepy. If there are two targets, this move hits each target once.
cobblemon.move.dragonenergy.desc: Converting its life-force into power, the user attacks opposing Pokémon. The lower the user's HP, the lower the move's power.
cobblemon.move.dragonhammer.desc: The user uses its body like a hammer to attack the target and inflict damage.
cobblemon.move.dragonpulse.desc: The target is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user's gaping mouth.
cobblemon.move.dragonrage.desc: This attack hits the target with a shock wave of pure rage. This attack always inflicts 40 HP damage.
cobblemon.move.dragonrush.desc: The user tackles the target while exhibiting overwhelming menace. This may also make the target flinch.
cobblemon.move.dragontail.desc: The target is knocked away, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.
cobblemon.move.drainingkiss.desc: The user steals the target's HP with a kiss. The user's HP is restored by over half of the damage taken by the target.
cobblemon.move.drainpunch.desc: An energy-draining punch. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
cobblemon.move.dreameater.desc: The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
cobblemon.move.drillpeck.desc: A corkscrewing attack that strikes the target with a sharp beak acting as a drill.
cobblemon.move.drillrun.desc: The user crashes into its target while rotating its body like a drill. Critical hits land more easily.
cobblemon.move.drumbeating.desc: The user plays its drum, controlling the drum's roots to attack the target. This also lowers the target's Speed stat.
cobblemon.move.dualchop.desc: The user attacks its target by hitting it with brutal strikes. The target is hit twice in a row.
cobblemon.move.dualwingbeat.desc: The user slams the target with its wings. The target is hit twice in a row.
cobblemon.move.dynamaxcannon.desc: The user unleashes a strong beam from its core. This move deals twice the damage if the target is Dynamaxed.
cobblemon.move.dynamicpunch.desc: The user punches the target with full, concentrated power. This confuses the target if it hits.
cobblemon.move.earthpower.desc: The user makes the ground under the target erupt with power. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.
cobblemon.move.earthquake.desc: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes every Pokémon around it.
cobblemon.move.echoedvoice.desc: The user attacks the target with an echoing voice. If this move is used every turn, its power is increased.
cobblemon.move.eerieimpulse.desc: The user's body generates an eerie impulse. Exposing the target to it harshly lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.
cobblemon.move.eeriespell.desc: The user attacks with its tremendous psychic power. This also removes 3 PP from the target's last move.
cobblemon.move.eggbomb.desc: A large egg is hurled at the target with maximum force to inflict damage.
cobblemon.move.electricterrain.desc: The user electrifies the ground for five turns, powering up Electric-type moves. Pokémon on the ground no longer fall asleep.
cobblemon.move.electrify.desc: If the target is electrified before it uses a move during that turn, the target's move becomes Electric type.
cobblemon.move.electroball.desc: The user hurls an electric orb at the target. The faster the user is than the target, the greater the move's power.
cobblemon.move.electrodrift.desc: Damage is multiplied by 1.3333 if this move is super effective against the target.
cobblemon.move.electroweb.desc: The user attacks and captures opposing Pokémon using an electric net. This lowers their Speed stats.
cobblemon.move.embargo.desc: This move prevents the target from using its held item for five turns. Its Trainer is also prevented from using items on it.
cobblemon.move.ember.desc: The target is attacked with small flames. This may also leave the target with a burn.
cobblemon.move.encore.desc: The user compels the target to keep using the move it encored for three turns.
cobblemon.move.endeavor.desc: This attack move cuts down the target's HP to equal the user's HP.
cobblemon.move.endure.desc: The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
cobblemon.move.energyball.desc: The user draws power from nature and fires it at the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.
cobblemon.move.entrainment.desc: The user dances with an odd rhythm that compels the target to mimic it, making the target's Ability the same as the user's.
cobblemon.move.eruption.desc: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with explosive fury. The lower the user's HP, the lower the move's power.
cobblemon.move.esperwing.desc: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1 stage and a higher chance for a critical hit.
cobblemon.move.eternabeam.desc: This is Eternatus's most powerful attack in its original form. The user can't move on the next turn.
cobblemon.move.expandingforce.desc: The user attacks the target with its psychic power. This move's power goes up and damages all opposing Pokémon on Psychic Terrain.
cobblemon.move.explosion.desc: The user attacks everything around it by causing a tremendous explosion. The user faints upon using this move.
cobblemon.move.extrasensory.desc: The user attacks with an odd, unseeable power. This may also make the target flinch.
cobblemon.move.extremeevoboost.desc: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Eevee, gets energy from its evolved friends and boosts its stats sharply.
cobblemon.move.extremespeed.desc: The user charges the target at blinding speed. This move always goes first.
cobblemon.move.facade.desc: This attack move doubles its power if the user is poisoned, burned, or paralyzed.
cobblemon.move.fairylock.desc: By locking down the battlefield, the user keeps all Pokémon from fleeing during the next turn.
cobblemon.move.fairywind.desc: The user stirs up a fairy wind and strikes the target with it.
cobblemon.move.fakeout.desc: This attack hits first and makes the target flinch. It only works the first turn each time the user enters battle.
cobblemon.move.faketears.desc: The user feigns crying to fluster the target, harshly lowering its Sp. Def stat.
cobblemon.move.falsesurrender.desc: The user pretends to bow its head, but then it stabs the target with its disheveled hair. This attack never misses.
cobblemon.move.falseswipe.desc: A restrained attack that prevents the target from fainting. The target is left with at least 1 HP.
cobblemon.move.featherdance.desc: The user covers the target's body with a mass of down that harshly lowers its Attack stat.
cobblemon.move.feint.desc: This attack hits a target using a move such as Protect or Detect. This also lifts the effects of those moves.
cobblemon.move.feintattack.desc: The user approaches the target disarmingly, then throws a sucker punch. This attack never misses.
cobblemon.move.fellstinger.desc: When the user knocks out a target with this move, the user's Attack stat rises drastically.
cobblemon.move.fierydance.desc: Cloaked in flames, the user attacks the target by dancing and flapping its wings. This may also raise the user's Sp. Atk stat.
cobblemon.move.fierywrath.desc: The user transforms its wrath into a fire-like aura to attack. This may also make opposing Pokémon flinch.
cobblemon.move.filletaway.desc: Raises the user's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by 2 stages in exchange for the user losing 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down. Fails if the user would faint or if its Attack, Special Attack, and Speed stat stages would not change.
cobblemon.move.finalgambit.desc: The user risks everything to attack its target. The user faints but does damage equal to its HP.
cobblemon.move.fireblast.desc: The target is attacked with an intense blast of all-consuming fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.
cobblemon.move.firefang.desc: The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it with a burn.
cobblemon.move.firelash.desc: The user strikes the target with a burning lash. This also lowers the target's Defense stat.
cobblemon.move.firepledge.desc: A column of fire hits the target. When used with its grass equivalent, its power increases and a vast sea of fire appears.
cobblemon.move.firepunch.desc: The target is punched with a fiery fist. This may also leave the target with a burn.
cobblemon.move.firespin.desc: The target becomes trapped within a fierce vortex of fire that rages for four to five turns.
cobblemon.move.firstimpression.desc: Although this move has great power, it only works the first turn each time the user enters battle.
cobblemon.move.fishiousrend.desc: The user rends the target with its hard gills. If the user attacks before the target, the power of this move is doubled.
cobblemon.move.fissure.desc: The user opens up a fissure in the ground and drops the target in. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.
cobblemon.move.flail.desc: The user flails about aimlessly to attack. The less HP the user has, the greater the move's power.
cobblemon.move.flameburst.desc: The user attacks the target with a bursting flame. The bursting flame damages Pokémon next to the target as well.
cobblemon.move.flamecharge.desc: Cloaking itself in flame, the user attacks the target. Then, building up more power, the user raises its Speed stat.
cobblemon.move.flamethrower.desc: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.
cobblemon.move.flamewheel.desc: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.
cobblemon.move.flareblitz.desc: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges the target. This also damages the user quite a lot. This attack may leave the target with a burn.
cobblemon.move.flash.desc: The user flashes a bright light that cuts the target's accuracy.
cobblemon.move.flashcannon.desc: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it all at once. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.
cobblemon.move.flatter.desc: Flattery is used to confuse the target. However, this also raises the target's Sp. Atk stat.
cobblemon.move.fleurcannon.desc: The user unleashes a strong beam. The attack's recoil harshly lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat.
cobblemon.move.fling.desc: The user flings its held item at the target to attack. This move's power and effects depend on the item.
cobblemon.move.flipturn.desc: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.
cobblemon.move.floatyfall.desc: The user floats in the air, and then dives at a steep angle to attack the target. This may also make the target flinch.
